A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: They took the franchise into a different direction\, and I'm not sure true day 1 fans will all approve. I understand wanting to push the series forward\, but you have to be respectful of what's come before it. There was no precedent for a few BIG things Rian Johnson did in the film\, so the moves felt out of place. Too many plot holes that fans of the saga will easily point out. Rian Johnson\, with this movie\, proved to me and the rest of the world that he didn't grow up on Star Wars like I did.
